subject: RE: [junit] Test Order Execution
msgSnippet: Just a quick note to say thanks to all for the tips. The test flow was re worked, and common preparation steps moved to separate methods, and it now works
messageBody:
Just a quick note to say thanks to all for the tips. The test flow was re worked, and common preparation steps moved to separate methods, and it now works properly. Thanks again.

Scott
